pageContent: Purpose: Screening with prostate specific antigen (PSA) to detect prostate cancer was started in Ikeda City Osaka from 2003 as part of the city's health program. We evaluated the first year's result.

metaData.source:
Quality of life after palliative radiotherapy in patients with hormone-resistant prostate cancer: single institution experience
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/7524999/
